issue.title: [Dev][CI] Add to nightlies dashboard last successful commit / date on failed jobs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16360](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16360). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add info to the nightlies dashboard on what was the last successful built job using previous builds json and add info of since when failures have been happening (last successful commit)
